info.name: Sultanahmet Inn Hotel
info.address: Kucukayasofya Neighborhood Ak Burcak Street No:23, Istanbul, Turkey 34122
info.longDescription:
Located in the Historic Peninsula district of Istanbul, Sultanahmet Inn Hotel offers rooms with free Wi-Fi. The hotel's terrace overlooks the Marmara Sea and the Blue Mosque. Some rooms have a private balcony.

The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Sultanahmet Inn are furnished with parquet floors and dark wood furniture. All rooms include a flat-screen cable TV, a minibar and double-glazed windows.

The hotel's 24-hour staff can help arrange excursions to Istanbul's main attractions. Sultanahmet Inn Hotel offers car rental, currency exchange and laundry services.

Guests can enjoy a local Turkish breakfast with fresh bread, olives, cheese, tomatoes, cereals and fruits every morning.

It is a 5-minute walk from Istanbul's major attractions, such as the Basilica Cistern, Hagia Sophia and Topkapi Palace. The Grand Bazaar is a 10-minute walk away. Free parking is available on site.
